eya ekala bharyawanta siya swamipurushaya mathpan panayakara athdayi soyaganimata bhawithakala bawata satahan wenawa. 1927 di engalanthaye naduwak sandaha, sakakaruwekuge prashwasa wathaya litar 2 ka madyasara mililitar 1.5 k adanguwima matha ohu "50% bimath" bawata groski nomathi polis shalyawaidyawaraya adhikaranaya hamuwe karunu dakwa thibenawa. 1931 di rola nil hagar nam jaiwarasayana widayagnyayeku wisin drankomitar namin melesa warna wenaswana balunayak handunwadun bawatath eya madhyasara panayakara riyapadawana pudgalayan handunaganima sandaha bhawithakala bawatath thorathuru thiyenawa. 1967 di engalanthaye bil dusi saha pari jons wisin prathama wathawata ilektronika yanthrayak me sandaha handunwa dunna eya. 1980 wasare engalanthaye thakshanika nirmanayan udesa wana rajakiya sammanayenda pudanu labuwa.
